reviewText: i have not watched the first movie. However this movie was amazing from acting to direction ti dialogue. Amazingly well made movie with good dialogues and great delivery of dialogues by all actors. Kudos to the director

A Marvelous Lovely movie
Thank You

Sequel is as good as the first one-Ishqiya. The new story and characters blend in with the two old grifters played by Naseerudin Shah and Arshad Warsi. Old mansion, the Begum played by Madhuri Dixit provide a nostalgic look at an era that is now history. The music and atmosphere feel very authentic. The new comer Begum friend and companion is beautiful and a good actress. Overall another classy movie from Vishal Bhardwaj.
